text: The Kongsberg attack happened on 13 October 2021. A man attacked seven people with a bow and arrow and a knife in Kongsberg, Norway. Five people were killed and two injured, and the suspected perpetrator was taken into custody. The attacker reportedly moved through the town and attacked people at many places before being arrested. ==References== Category:2021 mass shootings in Europe Category:2020s in Norway Category:2020s murders in Europe Category:Crime in Norway Category:Mass stabbings in Europe Category:Murder in 2021 Category:October 2021 events
title: Kongsberg attack
